alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:56AM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton and York Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could cause travel difficulties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall totals have trended downward and winter storm conditions are no longer expected. Even so, periods of light snow and temporarily reduced visibilities in areas of blowing snow will be possible through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
